revised_title: Classification and Analysis of Necrotic Virus Diseases in Potatoes
tldr: The authors analyze various necrotic virus diseases in potatoes, such as streak, leaf-drop, and top-necrosis, and classify them based on their histological changes and the location and nature of the necrotic lesions. They also discuss the discovery of two unit viruses, X and Y, which play a significant role in causing these diseases. The study helps in understanding the behavior of these viruses on different potato varieties and their clinical pictures.
scientific_discipline: Biology and Life Sciences > Plant Science
